summary:
This fix is currently included in the USKP 2.0.9 and later in an improved version (no more loincloth at all). Original mannequins in Skyrim have an incorrect underwear texture showing other parts from the body. This has been fixed.

This fix comes from the french elder scrolls fan community.

Best regards and enjoy ! :)
descriptionHtml:
This fix is currently included in the USKP. Original mannequins in Skyrim have an incorrect underwear texture showing other parts from the body. This has been fixed.


Installation : just put the data folder provided in Skyrim folder.

Uninstallation : just delete the 3 following files :
Meshes/actors/manekin/manekin.nif
Textures/actors/character/manekin/manakinunderwear.dds
Textures/actors/character/manekin/manakinunderwear_n.dds

Known bugs : none.

Conflicts : any mod also altering the original manekin.nif file.


I don't claim any property on this work, anyone can use and redistribute it without my authorization, but it would be highly appreciated to mention me in your credits.


Nico coiN from wiwiland, one of the best renowned forum about the elder scrolls series in french community : http://forum.wiwiland.net/
author: Nico coiN from wiwiland
